title: Fusilli with Tuna and Tomatoes
introduction: Fusilli with Tuna and Tomatoes is a delightful Italian dish that combines the savory flavors of olive oil-packed tuna with ripe tomatoes and aromatic herbs. Ideal for a quick yet satisfying meal, this recipe leverages the superior taste and texture of quality canned tuna, making it a favorite in Sicilian cuisine. This dish is perfect for those who appreciate the melding of robust flavors with the simplicity of pasta.
ingredients: 1 (7-ounce) can imported Italian or Spanish tuna packed in olive oil

instructions.instruction: In a large serving bowl, combine the tomatoes, tuna with its oil, basil, oregano, red pepper, and salt to taste.

Bring at least 4 quarts of water to a boil in a large pot. Add 2 tablespoons of salt, then the pasta. Stir well. Cook over high heat, stirring frequently, until the pasta is al dente, tender yet still firm to the bite. Set aside some of the cooking water. Drain the pasta.
Toss the pasta with the sauce. Add a little of the cooking water if the pasta seems dry. Serve immediately.
